slide.title: It was one of those rare days when the Tigers' batting bloomed at the Sher-e-Bangla National Stadium yesterday. Opener Anamul Haque (100) works the ball on the on-side. Photos: Firoz Ahmed
Anamul Haque partner Imrul Kayes (59) is perfectly balanced as he hits a sweetly-timed six. Photos: Firoz Ahmed
Mominul Haque (51) sweeps the ball fine. Photos: Firoz Ahmed
Captain Mushfiqur Rahim (51 not out) plays an improvised shot. Photos: Firoz Ahmed
Shakib Al Hasan ( 44 not out off 16 balls) heaves one over mid-wicket. Their collective contributions took the Tigers to a record 326-3. Photos: Firoz Ahmed
